org.team5940.robot_core.modules.functional.controls

Interface ControlsModule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Module
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericControlsModule

    public interface ControlsModule
extends Module
    Interface for generic access to joystick controls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean axisAvailable(java.lang.String axis)
      Determines if the axis requested is available.
      boolean buttonAvailable(java.lang.String button)
      Determines if the button requested is available.
      double getAxis(java.lang.String axis)
      Gets current value of joystick axis based on the type of joystick you are using.
      boolean getButton(java.lang.String button)
      Gets current value of joystick button based on the type of joystick you are using.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.team5940.robot_core.modules.Module

        getName, getSubModules, initialize, setLogger, shutDown

    • Method Detail

      • getAxis

        double getAxis(java.lang.String axis)
        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets current value of joystick axis based on the type of joystick you are using.
        Parameters:
        axis - String representation of the axis (ex. "up").
        Returns:
        current position of the axis as a double.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If axisAvailable would return false.

      • axisAvailable

        boolean axisAvailable(java.lang.String axis)
        Determines if the axis requested is available.
        Parameters:
        axis - The axis to check availability for.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the axis is available.

      • getButton

        boolean getButton(java.lang.String button)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Gets current value of joystick button based on the type of joystick you are using.
        Parameters:
        button - String representation of the button (ex. "jump").
        Returns:
        current position of the button as a boolean.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If buttonAvailable() would return false.

      • buttonAvailable

        boolean buttonAvailable(java.lang.String button)
        Determines if the button requested is available.
        Parameters:
        button - The button to check availability for.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the button is available.
